   20: 
   21: -module(ssl_payload_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   24: 
   25: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   27: %% Common test
   28: -export([all/0,
   29:          groups/0,
   30:          init_per_suite/1,
   31:          init_per_group/2,
   32:          init_per_testcase/2,
   33:          end_per_suite/1,
   34:          end_per_group/2,
   35:          end_per_testcase/2
   36:         ]).
   37: 
   38: %% Test cases
   39: -export([server_echos_passive_small/0,
   40:          server_echos_passive_small/1,
   41:          server_echos_passive_chunk_small/0,
   42:          server_echos_passive_chunk_small/1,
   43:          server_echos_active_once_small/0,
   44:          server_echos_active_once_small/1,
   45:          server_echos_active_small/0,
   46:          server_echos_active_small/1,
   47:          client_echos_passive_small/0,
   48:          client_echos_passive_small/1,
   49:          client_echos_passive_chunk_small/0,
   50:          client_echos_passive_chunk_small/1,
   51:          client_echos_active_once_small/0,
   52:          client_echos_active_once_small/1,
   53:          client_echos_active_small/0,
   54:          client_echos_active_small/1,
   55:          server_echos_passive_big/0,
   56:          server_echos_passive_big/1,
   57:          server_echos_passive_chunk_big/0,
   58:          server_echos_passive_chunk_big/1,
   59:          server_echos_active_once_big/0,
   60:          server_echos_active_once_big/1,
   61:          server_echos_active_big/0,
   62:          server_echos_active_big/1,
   63:          client_echos_passive_big/0,
   64:          client_echos_passive_big/1,
   65:          client_echos_passive_chunk_big/0,
   66:          client_echos_passive_chunk_big/1,
   67:          client_echos_active_once_big/0,
   68:          client_echos_active_once_big/1,
   69:          client_echos_active_big/0,
   70:          client_echos_active_big/1,
   71:          server_echos_passive_huge/0,
   72:          server_echos_passive_huge/1,
   73:          server_echos_passive_chunk_huge/0,
   74:          server_echos_passive_chunk_huge/1,
   75:          server_echos_active_once_huge/0,
   76:          server_echos_active_once_huge/1,
   77:          server_echos_active_huge/0,
   78:          server_echos_active_huge/1,
   79:          client_echos_passive_huge/0,
   80:          client_echos_passive_huge/1,
   81:          client_echos_passive_chunk_huge/0,
   82:          client_echos_passive_chunk_huge/1,
   83:          client_echos_active_once_huge/0,
   84:          client_echos_active_once_huge/1,
   85:          client_echos_active_huge/0,
   86:          client_echos_active_huge/1,
   87:          client_active_once_server_close/0,
   88:          client_active_once_server_close/1]).
   89: 
   90: %% Apply export
   91: -export([send/4,
   92:          send_close/2,
   93:          sender/2,
   94:          sender_active_once/2,
   95:          sender_active/2,
   96:          echoer/2,
   97:          echoer_chunk/2,
   98:          echoer_active_once/2,
   99:          echoer_active/2,
  100:          echo_recv/2,
  101:          echo_recv_chunk/3,
  102:          echo_active_once/2,
  103:          echo_active/2]).
  104: 
  105: -define(TIMEOUT, {seconds, 20}).
  106: -define(TIMEOUT_LONG, {seconds, 80}).
  107: 
  108: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  109: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
  110: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  111: all() -> 
  112:     [
  113:      {group, 'tlsv1.3'},
  114:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
  115:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
  116:      {group, 'tlsv1'}    
  117:     ].
  118: 
  119: groups() ->
  120:     [
  121:      {'tlsv1.3', [], payload_tests()},
  122:      {'tlsv1.2', [], payload_tests()},
  123:      {'tlsv1.1', [], payload_tests()},
  124:      {'tlsv1', [], payload_tests()}
  125:     ].
  126: 
  127: payload_tests() ->
  128:     [server_echos_passive_small,
  129:      server_echos_passive_chunk_small,
  130:      server_echos_active_once_small,
  131:      server_echos_active_small,
  132:      client_echos_passive_small,
  133:      client_echos_passive_chunk_small,
  134:      client_echos_active_once_small,
  135:      client_echos_active_small,
  136:      server_echos_passive_big,
  137:      server_echos_passive_chunk_big,
  138:      server_echos_active_once_big,
  139:      server_echos_active_big,
  140:      client_echos_passive_big,
  141:      client_echos_passive_chunk_big,
  142:      client_echos_active_once_big,
  143:      client_echos_active_big,
  144:      server_echos_passive_huge,
  145:      server_echos_passive_chunk_huge,
  146:      server_echos_active_once_huge,
  147:      server_echos_active_huge,
  148:      client_echos_passive_huge,
  149:      client_echos_passive_chunk_huge,
  150:      client_echos_active_once_huge,
  151:      client_echos_active_huge,
  152:      client_active_once_server_close].
  153: 
  154: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  155:     catch crypto:stop(),
  156:     try crypto:start() of
  157: 	ok ->
  158: 	    ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  159:             ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config)
  160:     catch _:_  ->
  161: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  162:     end.
  163: 
  164: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  165:     ssl:stop(),
  166:     application:stop(crypto).
  167: 
  168: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  169:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName, Config). 
  170: 
  171: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  172:   ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  173: 
  174: 
  175: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config)
  176:   when TestCase == server_echos_passive_huge;
  177:        TestCase == server_echos_passive_chunk_huge;
  178:        TestCase == server_echos_active_once_huge;
  179:        TestCase == server_echos_active_huge;
  180:        TestCase == client_echos_passive_huge;
  181:        TestCase == client_echos_passive_chunk_huge;
  182:        TestCase == client_echos_active_once_huge;
  183:        TestCase == client_echos_active_huge ->
  184:     case erlang:system_info(system_architecture) of
  185: 	"sparc-sun-solaris2.10" ->
  186: 	    {skip,"Will take to long time on an old Sparc"};
  187: 	_ ->
  188: 	    ct:timetrap(?TIMEOUT_LONG),
  189: 	    Config
  190:     end;
  191: 
  192: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config)
  193:   when TestCase == server_echos_passive_big;
  194:        TestCase == server_echos_passive_chunk_big;
  195:        TestCase == server_echos_active_once_big;
  196:        TestCase == server_echos_active_big;
  197:        TestCase == client_echos_passive_big;
  198:        TestCase == client_echos_passive_chunk_big;
  199:        TestCase == client_echos_active_once_big;
  200:        TestCase == client_echos_active_big ->
  201:     ct:timetrap(?TIMEOUT_LONG),
  202:     Config;
  203: 
  204: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  205:     ct:timetrap(?TIMEOUT),
  206:     Config.
  207: 
  208: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  209:     Config.
  210: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  211: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  212: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  213: 
  214: server_echos_passive_small() ->
  215:     [{doc, "Client sends 1000 bytes in passive mode to server, that receives them, "
  216:      "sends them back, and closes."}].
  217: 
  218: server_echos_passive_small(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  219:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  220:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  221:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  222:     %%
  223:     Data = binary:copy(<<"1234567890">>, 100),
  224:     server_echos_passive(
  225:       Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname).
  226: 
  227: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  228: 
  229: server_echos_passive_chunk_small() ->
  230:     [{doc, "Client sends 1000 bytes in passive mode to server, that receives them in chunks, "
  231:      "sends them back, and closes."}].
  232: 
  233: server_echos_passive_chunk_small(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  234:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  235:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  236:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  237:     %%
  238:     Data = binary:copy(<<"1234567890">>, 100),
  239:     server_echos_passive_chunk(
  240:       Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname).
  241: 
  242: 
  243: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  244: 
  245: server_echos_active_once_small() ->
  246:     [{doc, "Client sends 1000 bytes in active once mode to server, that receives "
  247:      " them, sends them back, and closes."}].
  248: 
  249: server_echos_active_once_small(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  250:         ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  251:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  252:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  253:     %%
  254:     Data = binary:copy(<<"1234567890">>, 100),
  255:     server_echos_active_once(
  256:       Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname).
  257: 
  258: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  259: 
  260: server_echos_active_small() ->
  261:     [{doc, "Client sends 1000 bytes in active mode to server, that receives them, "
  262:      "sends them back, and closes."}].
  263: 
  264: server_echos_active_small(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  265:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  266:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  267:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  268:     %%
  269:     Data = binary:copy(<<"1234567890">>, 100),
  270:     server_echos_active(
  271:       Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname).
  272: 
  273: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  274: client_echos_passive_small() ->
  275:     [{doc, "Server sends 1000 bytes in passive mode to client, that receives them, "

  487: 
  488: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  489: server_echos_active_huge() ->
  490:     [{doc, "Client sends 500000 bytes to server in active mode, that receives them, "
  491:      "sends them back, and closes."}].
  492: 
  493: server_echos_active_huge(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  494:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  495:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  496:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  497:     %%
  498:     Data = binary:copy(<<"1234567890">>, 50000),
  499:     server_echos_active(
  500:       Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname).
  501: 
  502: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  503: client_echos_passive_huge() ->
  504:     [{doc, "Server sends 500000 bytes to client in passive mode, that receives "
  505:      "them, sends them back, and closes."}].
  506: 
  507: client_echos_passive_huge(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  508:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  509:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  510:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  511:     %%
  512:     Data = binary:copy(<<"1234567890">>, 50000),
  513:     client_echos_passive(
  514:       Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname).
  515: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  516: client_echos_passive_chunk_huge() ->
  517:     [{doc, "Server sends 500000 bytes to client in passive mode, that receives "
  518:      "them, sends them back, and closes."}].
  519: 
  520: client_echos_passive_chunk_huge(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  521:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  522:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  523:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  524:     %%
  525:     Data = binary:copy(<<"1234567890">>, 50000),
  526:     client_echos_passive_chunk(
  527:       Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname).
  528: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  529: client_echos_active_once_huge() ->
  530:     [{doc, "Server sends 500000 bytes to client in active once mode, that receives "
  531:       "them, sends them back, and closes."}].
  532: 
  533: client_echos_active_once_huge(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  534:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  535:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  536:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  537:     %%
  538:     Data = binary:copy(<<"1234567890">>, 50000),
  539:     client_echos_active_once(
  540:       Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname).
  541:    
  542: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  543: client_echos_active_huge() ->
  544:     [{doc, "Server sends 500000 bytes to client in active mode, that receives them, "
  545:      "sends them back, and closes."}].
  546: 
  547: client_echos_active_huge(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  548:      ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  549:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  550:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  551:     %%
  552:     Data = binary:copy(<<"1234567890">>, 50000),
  553:     client_echos_active(
  554:       Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname).
  555:  
  556: 
  557: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  558: client_active_once_server_close() ->
  559:     [{doc, "Server sends 500000 bytes and immediately after closes the connection"
  560:      "Make sure client receives all data if possible"}].
  561: 
  562: client_active_once_server_close(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  563:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  564:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  565:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  566:     %%
  567:     Data = binary:copy(<<"1234567890">>, 50000),
  568:     client_active_once_server_close(
  569:       Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname).
  570:  
  571: 
  572: 
  573: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  574: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
  575: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  576: 
  577: server_echos_passive(
  578:   Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname) ->
  579:     Length = byte_size(Data),
  580:     Server =
  581:         ssl_test_lib:start_server(
  582:           [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  583:            {from, self()},
  584:            {mfa, {?MODULE, echoer, [Length]}},
  585:            {options, [{active, false}, {mode, binary} | ServerOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers()}]),
  586:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  587:     Client =
  588:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(
  589:           [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  590:            {host, Hostname},
  591:            {from, self()},
  592:            {mfa, {?MODULE, sender, [Data]}},
  593:            {options, [{active, false}, {mode, binary} | ClientOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers() }]),
  594:     %%
  595:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  596:     %%
  597:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  598:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  599: 
  600: server_echos_passive_chunk(
  601:   Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname) ->
  602:     Length = byte_size(Data),
  603:     Server =
  604:         ssl_test_lib:start_server(
  605:           [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  606:            {from, self()},
  607:            {mfa, {?MODULE, echoer_chunk, [Length]}},
  608:            {options, [{active, false}, {mode, binary} | ServerOpts]}]),
  609:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  610:     Client =
  611:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(
  612:           [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  613:            {host, Hostname},
  614:            {from, self()},
  615:            {mfa, {?MODULE, sender, [Data]}},
  616:            {options, [{active, false}, {mode, binary} | ClientOpts]}]),
  617:     %%
  618:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  619:     %%
  620:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  621:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  622: 
  623: server_echos_active_once(
  624:   Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname) ->
  625:     Length = byte_size(Data),
  626:     Server =
  627:         ssl_test_lib:start_server(
  628:           [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  629:            {from, self()},
  630:            {mfa, {?MODULE, echoer_active_once, [Length]}},
  631:            {options, [{active, once}, {mode, binary} | ServerOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers()}]),
  632:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  633:     Client =
  634:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(
  635:           [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  636:            {host, Hostname},
  637:            {from, self()},
  638:            {mfa, {?MODULE, sender_active_once, [Data]}},
  639:            {options, [{active, once}, {mode, binary} | ClientOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers() }]),
  640:     %%
  641:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  642:     %%
  643:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  644:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  645: 
  646: 
  647: server_echos_active(
  648:   Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname) ->
  649:     Length = byte_size(Data),
  650:     Server =
  651:         ssl_test_lib:start_server(
  652:           [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  653:            {from, self()},
  654:            {mfa, {?MODULE, echoer_active, [Length]}},
  655:            {options, [{active, true}, {mode, binary} | ServerOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers()}]),
  656:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  657:     Client =
  658:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(
  659:           [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  660:            {host, Hostname},
  661:            {from, self()},
  662:            {mfa, {?MODULE, sender_active, [Data]}},
  663:            {options, [{active, true}, {mode, binary} | ClientOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers()}]),
  664:     %%
  665:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  666:     %%
  667:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  668:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  669: 
  670: client_echos_passive(
  671:   Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname) ->
  672:     Length = byte_size(Data),
  673:     Server =
  674:         ssl_test_lib:start_server(
  675:           [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  676:            {from, self()},
  677:            {mfa, {?MODULE, sender, [Data]}},
  678:            {options, [{active, false}, {mode, binary} | ServerOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers()}]),
  679:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  680:     Client =
  681:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(
  682:           [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  683:            {host, Hostname},
  684:            {from, self()},
  685:            {mfa, {?MODULE, echoer, [Length]}},
  686:            {options, [{active, false}, {mode, binary} | ClientOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers()}]),
  687:     %%
  688:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  689:     %%
  690:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  691:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  692: 
  693: 
  694: client_echos_passive_chunk(
  695:   Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname) ->
  696:     Length = byte_size(Data),
  697:     Server =
  698:         ssl_test_lib:start_server(
  699:           [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  700:            {from, self()},
  701:            {mfa, {?MODULE, sender, [Data]}},
  702:            {options, [{active, false}, {mode, binary} | ServerOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers()}]),
  703:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  704:     Client =
  705:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(
  706:           [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  707:            {host, Hostname},
  708:            {from, self()},
  709:            {mfa, {?MODULE, echoer_chunk, [Length]}},
  710:            {options, [{active, false}, {mode, binary} | ClientOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers()}]),
  711:     %%
  712:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  713:     %%
  714:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  715:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  716: 
  717: 
  718: client_echos_active_once(
  719:   Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname) ->
  720:     Length = byte_size(Data),
  721:     Server =
  722:         ssl_test_lib:start_server(
  723:           [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  724:            {from, self()},
  725:            {mfa, {?MODULE, sender_active_once, [Data]}},
  726:            {options, [{active, once}, {mode, binary} | ServerOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers()}]),
  727:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  728:     Client =
  729:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(
  730:           [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  731:            {host, Hostname},
  732:            {from, self()},
  733:            {mfa, {?MODULE, echoer_active_once, [Length]}},
  734:            {options,[{active, once}, {mode, binary} | ClientOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers()}]),
  735:     %%
  736:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  737:     %%
  738:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  739:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  740: 
  741: client_echos_active(
  742:   Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname) ->
  743:     Length = byte_size(Data),
  744:     Server =
  745:         ssl_test_lib:start_server(
  746:           [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  747:            {from, self()},
  748:            {mfa, {?MODULE, sender_active, [Data]}},
  749:            {options, [{active, true}, {mode, binary} | ServerOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers()}]),
  750:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  751:     Client =
  752:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(
  753:           [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  754:            {host, Hostname},
  755:            {from, self()},
  756:            {mfa, {?MODULE, echoer_active, [Length]}},
  757:            {options, [{active, true}, {mode, binary} | ClientOpts] ++ ssl_test_lib:bigger_buffers()}]),
  758:     %
  759:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  760:     %%
  761:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  762:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  763: 
  764: client_active_once_server_close(
  765:   Data, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname) ->
  766:     Length = byte_size(Data),
  767:     Server =
  768:         ssl_test_lib:start_server(
  769:           [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  770:            {from, self()},
  771:            {mfa, {?MODULE, send_close, [Data]}},
  772:            {options, [{active, once}, {mode, binary} | ServerOpts]}]),
  773:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  774:     Client =
  775:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(
  776:           [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  777:            {host, Hostname},
  778:            {from, self()},
  779:            {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, active_once_recv, [Length]}},
  780:            {options,[{active, once}, {mode, binary} | ClientOpts]}]),
  781:     %%
  782:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
  783: 
  784: send(_Socket, _Data, 0, _) ->
  785:     ok;
  786: send(Socket, Data, Count, RecvEcho) ->
  787:     spawn(fun() -> ssl:send(Socket, Data) end),
  788:     RecvEcho(),
  789:     send(Socket, Data, Count - 1, RecvEcho).
  790: 
  791: send_close(Socket, Data) ->
  792:     ok = ssl:send(Socket, Data),
  793:     ssl:close(Socket).
  794: 
  795: sender(Socket, Data) ->
  796:     ?CT_LOG("Sender recv: ~p~n", [ssl:getopts(Socket, [active])]),
  797:     send(Socket, Data, 100,
  798:               fun() -> 
  799:                       ssl_test_lib:recv_disregard(Socket, byte_size(Data)) 
  800:               end).
  801: 
  802: sender_active_once(Socket, Data) ->
  803:     ?CT_LOG("Sender active once: ~p~n", [ssl:getopts(Socket, [active])]),
  804:     send(Socket, Data, 100,
  805:          fun() -> 
  806:                  ssl_test_lib:active_once_disregard(Socket, byte_size(Data)) 
  807:          end).
  808: 
  809: sender_active(Socket, Data) ->
  810:     ?CT_LOG("Sender active: ~p~n", [ssl:getopts(Socket, [active])]),
  811:     send(Socket, Data, 100,
  812:          fun() -> 
  813:                  ssl_test_lib:active_disregard(Socket, byte_size(Data)) 
  814:          end).
  815: 
  816: echoer(Socket, Size) ->
  817:     ?CT_LOG("Echoer recv: ~p~n", [ssl:getopts(Socket, [active])]),
  818:     echo_recv(Socket, Size * 100).
  819: 
  820: echoer_chunk(Socket, Size) ->
  821:     ?CT_LOG("Echoer recv: ~p~n", [ssl:getopts(Socket, [active])]),
  822:     echo_recv_chunk(Socket, Size, Size * 100).
  823: 
  824: echoer_active_once(Socket, Size) ->
  825:     ?CT_LOG("Echoer active once: ~p~n", [ssl:getopts(Socket, [active])]),
  826:     echo_active_once(Socket, Size * 100).
  827: 
  828: echoer_active(Socket, Size) ->
  829:     ?CT_LOG("Echoer active: ~p~n", [ssl:getopts(Socket, [active])]),
  830:     echo_active(Socket, Size * 100).
  831: 
  832: 
  833: %% Receive Size bytes
  834: echo_recv(_Socket, 0) ->
  835:     ok;
  836: echo_recv(Socket, Size) ->
  837:     {ok, Data} = ssl:recv(Socket, 0),
  838:     spawn(fun() -> ssl:send(Socket, Data) end),
  839:     echo_recv(Socket, Size - byte_size(Data)).
  840: 
  841: 
  842: %% Receive Size bytes
  843: echo_recv_chunk(_Socket, _, 0) ->
  844:     ok;
  845: echo_recv_chunk(Socket, ChunkSize, Size) ->
  846:     {ok, Data} = ssl:recv(Socket, ChunkSize),
  847:     spawn(fun() -> ssl:send(Socket, Data) end),
  848:     echo_recv_chunk(Socket, ChunkSize, Size - ChunkSize).
  849: 
  850: 
  851: %% Receive Size bytes
  852: echo_active_once(_Socket, 0) ->
  853:     ok;
  854: echo_active_once(Socket, Size) ->
  855:     receive
  856:         {ssl, Socket, Data} ->
  857:             spawn(fun() -> ssl:send(Socket, Data) end),
  858:             NewSize = Size - byte_size(Data),
  859:             ssl:setopts(Socket, [{active, once}]),
  860:             echo_active_once(Socket, NewSize)
  861:     end.
  862: 
  863: %% Receive Size bytes
  864: echo_active(_Socket, 0) ->
  865:     ok;
  866: echo_active(Socket, Size) ->
  867:     receive
  868:         {ssl, Socket, Data} ->
  869:             spawn(fun() -> ssl:send(Socket, Data) end),
  870:             echo_active(Socket, Size - byte_size(Data))
  871:     end.    
  872:         
  873:
